title: Short, Sweet, and Professional
text:
How we write emails ourselves reflects on us.

Whenever you use email, you need to do the following:

* Consider to whom you are writing.
* Know what the purpose of the email is.
* Include any details that could help.
* Keep it brief, but not too brief.
* Use proper English, including grammar and spelling.
* Since email is part of the Internet, never send something you may regret.
